duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze business requirements and translate them into functional Salesforce solutions.
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather, document, and prioritize business needs and processes.
Configure and customize Salesforce applications to align with business processes and requirements.
Develop and deliver high-quality business presentations and training sessions for end-users.
Provide ongoing support and maintenance of Salesforce applications and ensure user adoption and satisfaction.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, or related field (MBA preferred)
